hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select DISTINCT EOMP.EOMP_ID, EOMP.REC_STATUS, EOMP.ORG_ID, EOMP.EOMP_CODE, EOMP.CREATOR, EOMP.CREATE_TIME, EOMP.MODIFIER, EOMP.MODIFY_TIME, EOMP.REC_VER, EOMP.EOMP_NAME_EN, EOMP.EOMP_NAME, EOMP.EOMP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOMP.EOMP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOMP.EOMP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOMP.EOMP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOMP.EOMP_PRIORITY, EOMP.EOMP_EFFECT_ORDER_TIME, EOMP.EOMP_EFFECT_SHIPPER_TIME_FM, EOMP.EOMP_EFFECT_SHIPPER_TIME_TO, EOMP.EOMP_EFFECT_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EOMP.EOMP_EFFECT_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EOMP.EOMP_REMARK from EO_ORDER_MERGER_PARAM EOMP where 1=1 <<and EOMP.EOMP_CODE = :eompCode>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_NAME LIKE :eompName>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_NAME_EN LIKE :eompNameEn>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_CUSTOMER_CODE = :eompCustomerCode>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE = :eompOrderTypeCode>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_REMARK = :eompRemark>> <<and EOMP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<and EOMP.EOMP_PRIORITY LIKE :eompPriority>> <<and EOMP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> order by EOMP.EOMP_ID desc
